title: Cronbach's Alpha Calculator – Internal Consistency & Reliability

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Cronbach's alpha: \( \alpha = \frac{k}{k-1} \left(1 - \frac{\sum_{i=1}^k \sigma_i^2}{\sigma_T^2} \right) \) where: \( k \) = number of items \( \sigma_i^2 \) = variance of item i \( \sigma_T^2 \) = variance of total scores (sum of items) across respondents
